'''''Aesthetics of Ugliness''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Good Stuff, but Terrible Taste — Continued}}.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
*
-->
==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is likely a reference to the 1853 book ''{{w|Aesthetic of Ugliness}}'', written by German philosopher {{w|Karl Rosenkranz}}. The book likens ugliness to a "moral evil."
